com.mongodb.selector

类 LatencyMinimizingServerSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.selector.LatencyMinimizingServerSelector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ServerSelector

    public class LatencyMinimizingServerSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerSelector
    A server selector that accepts only servers within the given ping-time latency difference from the faster of the servers.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.0

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LatencyMinimizingServerSelector

        public LatencyMinimizingServerSelector(long acceptableLatencyDifference,
                                       java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        参数:
        acceptableLatencyDifference - the maximum difference in ping-time latency between the fastest ping time and the slowest of the chosen servers
        timeUnit - the time unit of the acceptableLatencyDifference

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAcceptableLatencyDifference

        public long getAcceptableLatencyDifference(java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Gets the acceptable latency difference.
        参数:
        timeUnit - the time unit to get it in.
        返回:
        the acceptable latency difference in the specified time unit

      • select

        public java.util.List<ServerDescription> select(ClusterDescription clusterDescription)
        从接口复制的说明: ServerSelector
        Select a list of server descriptions from the given cluster description according to some criteria.
        指定者:
        select 在接口中 ServerSelector
        参数:
        clusterDescription - the cluster of servers to select from
        返回:
        a non-null list of ServerDescriptions that meet the requirements of this ServerSelector. This may be empty.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
